_description: Satire on woman’s inconstancy — five six-line stanzas with disclaiming refrain: ‘But I will nott say so’

BLHar7578.First Lines: These women allboth grete and small
BLHar7578.Last Lines: …the best may be amendedbut I will not say so

Ritson,  Joseph,
